summary:
Saturn is the sixth planet from the Sun and the second largest in our solar system. It's a huge gas giant, about nine times wider than Earth, but with much lower density. Saturn orbits the Sun every 29.45 years. Its interior is made of a rocky core, metallic and liquid hydrogen, and helium. The planet appears yellow due to ammonia crystals in its atmosphere.

Saturn has an extensive ring system made of ice, rock, and dust. It has 146 known moons, including Titan, the second-largest moon in the solar system, which has its own atmosphere.
title: Saturn
